1464980.name: UNREAL LIFE Original Soundtrack "Sound of the Mind"
1464980.description:
This original soundtrack is composed of two CDs, including all of the 69 tracks from the game and 3 unused ones.
Enjoy the music that fills Unreal Life's world with color.

Title: Sound of the Mind
Disc 1: The Blue Book's Secret
Disc 2: The Girl with the Crimson Eyes

Music, lyrics: hako life
Music, arrangement, and mastering: Dia (Hiraoka)
Vocals: Mai Aoyagi
Vocals recording: Tetsuya Yoshida at Strobe Studio (strobe music)
